授業目的: The aim of this course is to understand the concept of communication, what features are involved in communication and how communication works in social interaction.
到達目標: At the end of the semester, students acquire skills for critical thinking as well as learn the basic principles of linguistics.
授業方法: workshop style - students are encouraged to have group discussions.
